End User License Agreement (EULA)

Herein "AUTHOR" shall refer to Victor Nakonechny, "PRODUCT" shall refer to "Memoires: The Diary" developed and provided by Victor Nakonechny, "SERVICES" shall refer to services developed and provided by Victor Nakonechny, "USER" shall refer to you, the user (either as an individual, single entity or group).

This End User License Agreement (EULA) is an agreement between you, the USER and the mentioned AUTHOR. By using the mentioned AUTHOR's PRODUCTS, SERVICES and all other documents associated with and/or accompanying such, you:

1. Agree to have read, fully understand and agree to be bound by, the terms set out below.

2. Acknowledge and agree that PRODUCT may contain third-party content and you may be subject to third-party terms, and the third parties may enforce term against you. AUTHOR is not responsible for third-party changes to their services.

3. Consent to the collection, sharing and onward transfer of your data, including, but not limited to voice, photos and location data, is outlined by Privacy Policy. Location and weather data may be from mixed sources and may not be accurate. Use at your own risk.

4. Acknowledge that certain information required phone services and data access. AUTHOR does not charge for that services, but operator rates for phone and data may apply.

I. 	Products
II. 	Services
III. 	License
IV. 	Distribution
V. 	Distribution Restrictions
VI. 	EULA Modifications
VII. 	EULA Termination
VIII. third-party APPLICATION AND SERVICES

I. PRODUCT

All PRODUCT and accompanying materials provided by the AUTHOR, are provided "as is", without warranty.

THERE IS NO WARRANTY FOR THE PROGRAM, TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW. EXCEPT WHEN OTHERWISE STATED IN WRITING THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND/OR OTHER PARTIES PROVIDE THE PROGRAM "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. THE ENTIRE RISK AS TO THE QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE OF THE PROGRAM IS WITH YOU. SHOULD THE PROGRAM PROVE DEFECTIVE, YOU ASSUME THE COST OF ALL NECESSARY SERVICING, REPAIR OR CORRECTION.
By using the PRODUCTS, you agree not to hold the AUTHOR liable for any damages that may occur.

Further you agree that PRODUCT may be discontinued at any time, without prior notification.

II. SERVICES

All SERVICES and accompanying materials provided by the AUTHOR, are provided "as is", without warranty. By using the SERVICES, you agree not to hold the AUTHOR liable for any damages that may occur. Further you agree that SERVICES may be discontinued at any time, without prior notification.

III. LICENSE

Under the terms of this agreement, a non-exclusive [FREEWARE] license is granted to the USER on the understanding the AUTHOR retains ALL rights to SERVICES, PRODUCT, written materials and other such supplies.

Under this agreement, you are free to download and/or use the SERVICES and PRODUCT provided by the AUTHOR for personal, but are NOT permitted to attempt to modify, decompile, merge, sell, lease or otherwise misuse or use for profit said AUTHOR's PRODUCT and/or SERVICES, including but not limited to, all graphics, documents, eula.txt and other such file's.

IV. DISTRIBUTION

Under the terms of this agreement, the AUTHOR grants you a non-exclusive license to re-distribute all PRODUCT provided by said AUTHOR, on the understanding no attempt is made to sell or otherwise personally or financially gain from the distribution of such PRODUCT. All file's provided MUST remain unchanged and in full.

V. DISTRIBUTION RESTRICTIONS

Whilst the AUTHOR grants you permission to distribute said AUTHOR's PRODUCT, the following restrictions apply in all cases where the PRODUCT and/or SERVICE has been developed and/or [is] provided by, said AUTHOR.

You may not list any of the AUTHOR's PRODUCT on website's that charge for access to listings, downloadable file's or other such material for profit.

You may not list or distribute said AUTHOR's PRODUCT via cd-rom or other such media, except where charges are for postage only.

You may not "bundle" ANY of said AUTHOR's products with ANY product and/or service that has not been developed and/or [is] provided by said AUTHOR.

If including said AUTHOR's PRODUCT on media such as CD-ROM, DVD, floppy diskette, the AUTHOR must be informed prior to your doing so. Additionally, said AUTHOR reserves the right to be sent a copy of such media without charge, monetary or otherwise.

VI. EULA MODIFICATIONS

The aformentioned AUTHOR reserves the right to modify this EULA at any time, without notice. Should such a modification take place, the USER is expected to read and agree to such modifications within 7 days. Failure to agree to such modifications shall require said USER cease using said AUTHOR's PRODUCT and/or SERVICES.

VII. EULA TERMINATION

Said AUTHOR reserves the right to terminate this agreement at any time, in whole or part without notice or prior warning. Should such a termination take place, the USER shall be granted a non-exclusive gratis license to carry on using said AUTHOR's PRODUCT and/or SERVICES with the same restrictions above, but with the understanding, no support shall be provided for said PRODUCT and/or SERVICE. Said gratis license shall apply for a period no less than 3 years, and no more than 500 years. 

VIII. third-party APPLICATION AND SERVICES

PRODUCT may make third-party applications available through their public services or APIs. Information collected by third-party application is governed by their terms of service and privacy policies. 

PRODUCT may make third-party online services available such Google Docs, Google Picasa and others. Information collected by the third-party services is governed by their term of services and privacy policies.

You should be also agree with the terms of use and the privacy policies of the following services used by PRODUCT:

* Google Terms of Services and Privacy Policy:
  https://www.google.com/policies/
